name: A Feudal Fairy Tale
effect: Search your deck for a copy of Inuyasha, Kagome, Miroku, Sango, Shippo, or Kirrara and put it in your hand.

name: A Pleasant Surprise
effect: Play during Setup. Attach to a character you control and name a a keyword. This character gains that keyword. (*) Limit one copy per deck.

name: Heroes of the Feudal Era
effect: Play during Recovery. Search your deck for a copy of either Inuyasha, Kagome, Sango, Miroku, Shippo or Kirara and put it your hand. (*) Limit 3 copies per deck.

name: Inuyasha's Backlash Wave
effect: Play when Inuyasha is attacked. Expend Inuyasha to defeat the attacking character. (*) Limit one copy per deck.

name: Inuyasha, Champion of Heroes
effect:
White: 4
Blue: 6
Green: 8

Cute - Demon - Good - Human - Male - Unique
To play this Inuyasha you must control a different Inuyasha. (*) When played search your deck for a card that has a keyword and put it in your hand. (*) Your Kagome and Kikyo cannot be attacked.

name: Inuyasha, Feudal Champion
effect:
White: 4
Blue: 6
Green: 3

Cute - Demon - Good - Human - Male - Unique
To play this Inuyasha you must control a different Inuyasha. (*) When played and you control Kagome, you may expend Kagome to defeat one of your opponent's characters. (*) Kagome cannot be attacked while you control Inuyasha.

name: Inuyasha, Helpful Friend
effect:
White: 7
Blue: 6
Green: 3

Cute - Demon - Good - Human - Male - Modern - Unique
When Inuyasha is defeated, you may return Inuyasha to your hand to shuffle the bottom 10 cards of your discard pile into your deck. (*) You may expend Inuyasha to save a Good character you control.

name: Inuyasha, Protector of the Shikon Jewel
effect:
Black: 5
Blue: 7
Purple: 4

Cute - Demon - Good - Human - Male - Unique
(Power UP: Save your Kagome and search your discard pile for a item with "Jewel" in the title and put it in your hand.) (*) When Inuyasha is attacked while you control Kagome, you may discard a card from your hand to ready Kagome. (*) Your Kagome cannot be attacked.

name: Inuyasha, Seeker of the Shikon Jewel
effect:
White: 6
Red: 3
Purple: 4

Cute - Demon - Good - Human - Male - Unique
To play this Inuyasha you must control a different Inuyasha. (*) When played, search your discard pile for Tetsusaiga and attach to Inuyasha at no cost. (*) When Inuyasha defeats a character search your discard pile for a card that is not limited to one copy per deck and put it in your hand.

name: Kagome, Caring Soul
effect:
White: 7
Red: 4
Purple: 6

Cute - Female - Good - Human - Modern - Priestess - Unique
To play this Kagome you must control a different Kagome. (*) The first time each turn one of your characters is defeated, save it. (*) Kagome cannot be attacked while you control Inuyasha.

name: Kikyo, Inuyasha's Old Love
effect:
Black: 3
Red: 4
Purple: 6

Cute - Female - Good - Human - Priestess - Unique
When played search your deck for a copy of Inuyasha and put him in your hand. (*) While Kikyo has an item with "Jewel" in the title attached, you may use the effect of your Kaitou card once per Setup. (*) Kikyo cannot be attacked while you control Inuyasha.

name: Looking to the Sky
effect: Discard a Good character from your hand to draw the bottom 2 cards of your deck. (*) Limit 1 copy per deck. (*) Remove from the game after use.

name: Lost in Thought
effect: Search your discard pile for 5 cards and shuffle them into your deck. (*) Limit one copy per deck. (*) Remove from the game after use.

name: Miroku, Lecherous Monk
effect:
Black: 6
Red: 5
Green: 3

Cute - Good - Human - Male - Priest - Unique
When played choose a Female you control. The chosen Female cannot be attacked while Miroku is ready. If you control Sango choose 2 Females instead. (*) When Miroku is defeated shuffle one card from your discard pile into your deck for each Female you control.

name: Naraku's Evil Influence
effect: Search your opponent's deck for a character and put it in play under your control for this turn and beyond. (*) Remove from the game after use. (*) Limit one copy per deck.

name: Narrow Escape
effect: Attach to a character you control. When this character is defeated, you may remove this card from the game to save that character. (*) Limit 1 copy per deck

name: Sesshomaru, Rival Brother
effect:
Black: 7
Purple: 4
Green: 6

Cute - Demon - Evil - Male - Unique
To play this Sesshomaru, you must control a different Sesshomaru. (*) When played search your deck for Jaken or Rin and put it into play. (*) You may expend Jaken or Rin to ready Sesshomaru.

name: Studying Hard
effect: Once per game during Battle, reveal the top 10 cards of your deck. Put any of those cards at the bottom of your deck. Put the rest on top of your deck in any order.

name: Waking Up
effect: Play at the start of Battle. Your opponent must skip for his first 2 actions in this Battle. You cannot attack during your first 2 actions in this Battle. (*) Remove from the game after use. (*) Limit 1 copy per deck.

name: Watching Each Other's Back
effect: Search your opponent's deck for 3 cards and remove them from the game. (*) Limit 3 copies per deck.
